doc:
Mack Gray https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Mack_Gray 0 Mack Gray (December 11, 1905, Brooklyn, New York – January 17, 1981, Beverly Hills, California) was an American actor who was the brother of Joe Gray and great-uncle of Jon Abrahams. He was given the nickname "Killer" by Carole Lombard due to his roles in films as a tough guy. Longtime friend and confidant of George Raft, Dean Martin, and Frank Sinatra. Mack_Gray ( December_11_,_1905 , Brooklyn , New_York – January_17_,_1981 , Beverly_Hills , California ) was an_American_actor who was the_brother of Joe_Gray and great-uncle of Jon_Abrahams . He was_given the_nickname_"_Killer " by Carole_Lombard due to his_roles in films as a_tough_guy . Longtime_friend_and_confidant of George_Raft , Dean_Martin , and Frank_Sinatra .
